alert.note: Alert for Clay; Lincoln; Minnehaha; Turner; Union; Yankton (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued November 09 at 2:28AM MST until November 09 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON CST TODAY THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR PORTIONS OF SOUTHEAST SOUTH DAKOTA, NORTHEAST NEBRASKA, AND NORTHWEST IOWA... * AFFECTED AREA...In Iowa, Lyon, Osceola, Dickinson, Sioux, O`Brien, Clay, Plymouth, Cherokee, Buena Vista, Woodbury and Ida. In Nebraska, Dixon and Dakota. In South Dakota, Minnehaha, Turner, Lincoln, Yankton, Clay and Union. * WINDS...West 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 30 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Clay; Lincoln; Minnehaha; Turner; Union; Yankton
